material.mattext: What is the 95% confidence interval for μ? Interpret it in context.

Here is the R output:
> t.test(sleep, conf.level=0.95)
One Sample t-test
data: sleep t = 54.8337, df = 141, p-value < 2.2e-16 alternative hypothesis: true mean is not equal to 0 95 percent confidence interval: 7.090439 7.620828 sample estimates: mean of x 7.355634
We are 95% certain that the mean number of hours college students in this state university sleep in a typical day is between 7.09 and 7.62.
